processingCommand.script:
:SET &INSTANCE_NAME#                  = &TARGET_INSTANCE_NAME#
:PUBLISH &INSTANCE_NAME#,,TOP

:SET &TARGET_MAINTENANCESID#          = &ZABBIX_MAINTENANCESID#
:PUBLISH &TARGET_MAINTENANCESID#,,TOP

:SET &TARGET_RUN_MODE#                = &APP_RUN_MODE#
:PUBLISH &TARGET_RUN_MODE#,,TOP

:SET &TARGET_APP_TYPE#                = &APP_TYPE#
:PUBLISH &TARGET_APP_TYPE#,,TOP

:SET &TARGET_WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#      = &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#
:SET &TARGET_REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER#     = &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER#
:SET &TARGET_RW_PRIMARY_SERVER#       = &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER#
:SET &TARGET_EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#      = &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#

:SET &TARGET_WMS_P_SHOULD_RUN#        = &WMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#
:SET &TARGET_REFS_P_SHOULD_RUN#       = &REFS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#
:SET &TARGET_RW_P_SHOULD_RUN#         = &RW_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#
:SET &TARGET_EMS_P_SHOULD_RUN#        = &EMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#

:PUBLISH &TARGET_WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_RW_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER#,,TOP

:PUBLISH &TARGET_WMS_P_SHOULD_RUN#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_REFS_P_SHOULD_RUN#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_RW_P_SHOULD_RUN#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_EMS_P_SHOULD_RUN#,,TOP

:SET &TARGET_WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#     = &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#
:SET &TARGET_REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER#    = &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER#
:SET &TARGET_RW_FAILOVER_SERVER#      = &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER#
:SET &TARGET_EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#     = &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#

:SET &TARGET_WMS_F_SHOULD_RUN#        = &WMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#
:SET &TARGET_REFS_F_SHOULD_RUN#       = &REFS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#
:SET &TARGET_RW_F_SHOULD_RUN#         = &RW_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#
:SET &TARGET_EMS_F_SHOULD_RUN#        = &EMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#

:PUBLISH &TARGET_WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_RW_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER#,,TOP

:PUBLISH &TARGET_WMS_F_SHOULD_RUN#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_REFS_F_SHOULD_RUN#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_RW_F_SHOULD_RUN#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_EMS_F_SHOULD_RUN#,,TOP

:SET &TARGET_WMS_USERNAME#            = &WMS_USERNAME#
:SET &TARGET_REFS_USERNAME#           = &REFS_USERNAME#
:SET &TARGET_RW_USERNAME#             = &RW_USERNAME#
:SET &TARGET_EMS_USERNAME#            = &EMS_USERNAME#

:PUBLISH &TARGET_WMS_USERNAME#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_REFS_USERNAME#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_RW_USERNAME#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_EMS_USERNAME#,,TOP

:SET &TARGET_WMS_PRIMARY_URL#  = &WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#
:SET &TARGET_REFS_PRIMARY_URL# = &REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#
:SET &TARGET_RW_PRIMARY_URL#   = &RW_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#
:SET &TARGET_EMS_PRIMARY_URL#  = &EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER_URL#

:PUBLISH &TARGET_WMS_PRIMARY_URL#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_REFS_PRIMARY_URL#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_RW_PRIMARY_URL#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_EMS_PRIMARY_URL#,,TOP

:SET &TARGET_WMS_FAILOVER_URL#  = &WMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#
:SET &TARGET_REFS_FAILOVER_URL# = &REFS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#
:SET &TARGET_RW_FAILOVER_URL#   = &RW_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#
:SET &TARGET_EMS_FAILOVER_URL#  = &EMS_FAILOVER_SERVER_URL#

:PUBLISH &TARGET_WMS_FAILOVER_URL#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_REFS_FAILOVER_URL#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_RW_FAILOVER_URL#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_EMS_FAILOVER_URL#,,TOP

:SET &TARGET_DB_DIRECTORY_NAME#       = &DB_DIRECTORY_NAME#
:PUBLISH &TARGET_DB_DIRECTORY_NAME#,,TOP

:SET &TARGET_WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#          = &WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#
:SET &TARGET_WMS_DB_PORT#             = &WMS_DB_PORT#
:SET &TARGET_WMS_DB_SID#              = &WMS_DB_SID#
:SET &TARGET_WMS_DB_USERNAME#         = &WMS_DB_USERNAME#
:SET &TARGET_WMS_DB_PASSWORD#         = &WMS_DB_PASSWORD#
:SET &TARGET_WMS_DB_SCHEMA#           = &WMS_DB_SCHEMA#

:SET &TARGET_REFS_DB_VIP_PRI#         = &REFS_DB_VIP_PRI#
:SET &TARGET_REFS_DB_PORT#            = &REFS_DB_PORT#
:SET &TARGET_REFS_DB_SID#             = &REFS_DB_SID#
:SET &TARGET_REFS_DB_USERNAME#        = &REFS_DB_USERNAME#
:SET &TARGET_REFS_DB_PASSWORD#        = &REFS_DB_PASSWORD#
:SET &TARGET_REFS_DB_SCHEMA#          = &REFS_DB_SCHEMA#

:SET &TARGET_EMS_DB_VIP_PRI#          = &EMS_DB_VIP_PRI#
:SET &TARGET_EMS_DB_PORT#             = &EMS_DB_PORT#
:SET &TARGET_EMS_DB_SID#              = &EMS_DB_SID#
:SET &TARGET_EMS_DB_USERNAME#         = &EMS_DB_USERNAME#
:SET &TARGET_EMS_DB_PASSWORD#         = &EMS_DB_PASSWORD#
:SET &TARGET_EMS_DB_SCHEMA#           = &EMS_DB_SCHEMA#

:PUBLISH &TARGET_WMS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_WMS_DB_PORT#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_WMS_DB_SID#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_WMS_DB_USERNAME#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_WMS_DB_PASSWORD#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_WMS_DB_SCHEMA#,,TOP

:PUBLISH &TARGET_REFS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_REFS_DB_PORT#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_REFS_DB_SID#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_REFS_DB_USERNAME#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_REFS_DB_PASSWORD#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_REFS_DB_SCHEMA#,,TOP

:PUBLISH &TARGET_EMS_DB_VIP_PRI#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_EMS_DB_PORT#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_EMS_DB_SID#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_EMS_DB_USERNAME#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_EMS_DB_PASSWORD#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &TARGET_EMS_DB_SCHEMA#,,TOP

! Set Copy
:SET &WMS_COPY#       = "false"
:SET &REFS_COPY#      = "false"
:SET &RW_COPY#        = "false"
:SET &EMS_COPY#       = "false"

:SET &WMS_DB_COPY#    = "false"
:SET &REFS_DB_COPY#   = "false"
:SET &EMS_DB_COPY#    = "false"

:IF &TARGET_WMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &WMS_COPY# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &TARGET_REFS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &REFS_COPY# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &TARGET_RW_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &RW_COPY# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &TARGET_EMS_PRIMARY_SERVER# <> ""
:  SET &EMS_COPY# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &TARGET_WMS_DB_VIP_PRI# <> ""
:  SET &WMS_DB_COPY# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &TARGET_REFS_DB_VIP_PRI# <> ""
:  SET &REFS_DB_COPY# = "true"
:ENDIF

:IF &TARGET_EMS_DB_VIP_PRI# <> ""
:  SET &EMS_DB_COPY# = "true"
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &WMS_COPY#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &REFS_COPY#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &RW_COPY#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &EMS_COPY#,,TOP

:PUBLISH &WMS_DB_COPY#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &REFS_DB_COPY#,,TOP
:PUBLISH &EMS_DB_COPY#,,TOP
